name: The Cool War
description:
The Wall has fallen and you can hear the cogs of change rapidly turning. The freedom-tasting burgers, rebelious blue jeans and mindwashing Pop music are all at your doorstep.

Take control of the Glorious Leader's ultimate weapon: The Proletariat Power Mech, and squash all of the the rotten capitalistic influences!

Because, Comrades, you either live and eat borsch or you die holding a Cheeseburger!

Remember, the People's Republic of Motherlandia will fall if all succumb to the western mind control or there is no one to rule over in the country!

CONTROLS:

- WSAD -> movement
- Mouse -> aiming
- LMB -> machinegun
- RMB -> missles
- Spacebar -> Powerslam

THE TEAM:

Konrad Słabig - Coding

Michał Król - Design

Kasia Sabatowicz - Sound

Robert Podgórski - Art

Vlad Micu - Concept

We stole a lot of the music and sprites. Just like the people of the '90s!

SPRITES, ART & VFX:

Metal Slug
Mother 3
RUSSKAJA - Energia (screenshot from music clip)
